# delegate

**Instance Property**

An object you provide to mediate synchronization of the view’s AR scene information with SceneKit content.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any ARSCNViewDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Responding to AR Updates

- **ARSCNViewDelegate**: Methods you can implement to mediate the automatic synchronization of SceneKit content with an AR session.
